divs: sighting detailsi was travelling south on dixon road and at about 600 n in tipton countym i witnessed three white lights in a triangular pattern hovering just a few feeto ffo the ground over a field. i could see that the lights were attached to a larger, triangular craft. the lights\craft moved forward a few feet, then back, then forward again and then shot straight up and away fast. i had pulled off the side of the road to watch, for approximately 5 minutes. about 2 minutes after the lights\craft left, 5 choppers arrived at the area and went in the direction of the craft. they all had spotlights on. the weather was clear and warm.
trends: There have been 61 other sightings in Kokomo
There were no other sightings in Kokomo on or around June 21st 2009
Summary: 3 white lights hover over field, move erratic and then are followed by choppers
